birth_place.zh-cn: 积石山保安族东乡族撒拉族自治县
birth_place.en: Jishishan Bonan, Dongxiang and Salar Autonomous County

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，保安族，中国共产党党员。曾任第十三届全国人民代表大会甘肃省代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Bonan ethnicity, and a member of the Communist Party of China. She served as a delegate from Gansu Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 积石山保安族东乡族撒拉族自治县

zh-cn: 积石山保安族东乡族撒拉族自治县
en: Jishishan Bonan, Dongxiang and Salar Autonomous County

description.zh-cn: 位于中国甘肃省的一个自治县，是董彩云的家乡。
description.en: An autonomous county in Gansu Province, China, and the hometown of Dong Caiyun.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，是中国共产党的执政地。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, governed by the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 积石山保安族东乡族撒拉族自治县

description.zh-cn: 董彩云是甘肃积石山人。
description.en: Dong Caiyun is from Jishishan, Gansu.

description.zh-cn: 董彩云是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Dong Caiyun is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，董彩云被选为甘肃省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Dong Caiyun was elected as a delegate representing Gansu Province to the 13th National People's Congress.
